text2: Effortlessly exchange with complete transparency, security, and convenience. Your journey to financial freedom starts here.
footerDescription: Effortlessly exchange with complete transparency, security, and convenience. Your journey to financial freedom starts here.

features.descriptionTradeWorldwide: Buy and sell local and digital currencies including Bitcoin, Ethereum, Tether, and USDC – across 140 markets with 500+ payment methods.
features.descriptionSendMoneyInstantly: Send cash or cryptocurrency to anyone, anytime – with faster, cheaper, and simpler transactions powered by the blockchain.
features.descriptionAccessTheGlobe: By using Tether Zone, we can overcome local infrastructure limitations.

LevelPrepared: The level is currently being Prepared

signUp.title: Sign Up
signUp.tetherGuideNote1: Your Tether (USDT) address is a unique string of lettersand numbers used to receive USDT cryptocurrency. This address is linked to your account for processing payments or withdrawals.
signUp.tetherGuideNote2: Please make sure the address is a valid Solana (SOL) address from the Phantom Wallet, which we currently support.
signUp.tetherGuideNote3: Copy the address directly from your Phantom Wallet.
signUp.tetherGuideNote4: The address must belong to you. Do not enter someone else's wallet address
signUp.tetherGuideNote5: Please double-check the address before submitting.
signUp.tetherGuideNote6: Entering an incorrect address may result in aloss of funds, and we will not be able to recover them.
signUp.tetherGuideNote7: For future transactions, you must use the same wallet address you provided during sign-up in order for your transactions to be processed correctly.
signUp.telegramPlaceholder: Please enter only the ID without the @.
signUp.phonePlaceholder: Please enter only the number without dashes
signUp.uploadCardText1: A photo showing both the ID card and the face together
signUp.uploadCardText2: If you attach an additional photo, the existing one will be deleted.
signUp.uploadGuideText2: Upload a clear image of you holding a valid ID card. Your face and ID details must be visible. The image should resemble the example above. Blurry cropped,  or fake IDs will not be accepted.
signUp.passwordError: Please use a password that combines English letters and numbers.
signUp.nicknameError: Please use a nickname with English letters or a combination of English letters and numbers.
signUp.nicknameAlreadyInUSe: This nickname is already in use.
signUp.matchPasswordError: The password does not match the one previously entered.

signIn.title: Welcome Back
signIn.contactAdmin: Please contact the administrator through the Telegram link.

profile.levelSystemPending: The level system is currently being prepared.

sellorder.solanaOnly: Only one Solana chain can be selected.
sellorder.noticeTitle: [Notice] Please read the following carefully before proceeding to the next step.

noticePoints.checkAddress: Before making a deposit, make sure the copied wallet address is correct. Paste it into a memo to double-check.
noticePoints.wrongAddress: If you deposit to the wrong wallet address, we cannot recover your funds.
noticePoints.solanaSupport: Only Solana (SOL) chain is supported. Platforms like Binance, Bybit, and wallets like Phantom support Solana.
noticePoints.otherChainsUnsupported: Deposits via TRC-20, ERC-20, or other chains are not supported.
noticePoints.usdtRateVaries: The USDT price may vary based on Korean exchange rates.
noticePoints.usdtFixedPriceNote: USDT rates may slightly fluctuate depending on transaction completion time.

sellorder.confirmationText: I hereby acknowledge that I have carefully read and understood all of the above notices. I accept full responsibility for any financial loss caused by not following them.
sellorder.confirmationText2: Before the transaction, please transfer USDT (phantom wallet) to the address below.
sellorder.underPreparation: Level system is currently under preparation.
